statements: UPDATE sustainability_report SET social_impact = 8.5, environmental_impact = 6.2 WHERE company_id = 123;
UPDATE sustainability_report SET environmental_impact = 3.8, social_impact = 5.4 WHERE company_id = 456;
UPDATE sustainability_report SET social_impact = 7.5, environmental_impact = 5.3 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_report SET environmental_impact = 4.8, social_impact = 6.2 WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE company_impact SET social_impact_score = 8.5 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_reporting SET report_date = '2022-09-20', report_text = 'Updated sustainability report' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE company_impact SET social_impact_score = 8.5, environmental_impact_score = 7.2 WHERE company_id = 101;
UPDATE sustainability_reporting SET report_text = 'New sustainability update report', report_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE company_id = 202;
UPDATE company SET company_name = 'ABC Corp', company_location = 'New York' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE social_impact SET category = 'Sustainability', impact_description = 'Reducing carbon footprint' WHERE company_id = 3;
UPDATE company SET company_name = 'ABC Corp', company_location = 'New York' WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE social_impact SET impact_description = 'Reduced greenhouse gas emissions by 30%' WHERE company_id = 3 AND category = 'Environmental';
UPDATE SustainabilityMetrics SET carbon_footprint = 50, waste_generated = 20 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE SocialImpact SET community_engagement = 'High', employee_diversity = 'Medium' WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
UPDATE SustainabilityMetrics SET carbon_footprint = 150.25, waste_generated = 75.6 WHERE company_name = 'Company ABC';
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET electricity_consumption = 500.75, gas_consumption = 250.3 WHERE company_name = 'Company XYZ';
UPDATE company SET revenue = 1500000 WHERE company_id = 101;
UPDATE employee SET department = 'Marketing', hire_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE company SET revenue = 1000000.50 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE sustainability_goal SET progress = 0.75, target_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE goal_id = 3;
